name: Asterix & Obelix XXL2: Mission: Las Vegum
summary:
THE KINGDOM OF GAMES! 
 
SPOOFISHLY INSANE: THE FIRST VIDEO GAME PARODY! 
Confront the most famous characters in the history of video gaming and discover over a hundred icons of the game-screen hidden among the levels. 
 
ACCESS THE LEVELS LIKE CHAPTERS ON A DVD: 
Go directly to the start of each of the 9 theme zones in the park. No more frustration at never seeing the 3rd level - even for the youngest players. 
 
FURIOUS COMBAT. FEATURING A DOZEN EXPLOSIVE ATTACKS. AND OUTRAGEOUS COMBOS: 
Raining Menhirs. Twister Fusion. Lightning Move... 
 
30 MINUTES OF ORIGINAL. GUT-BUSTING. ANIMATED SEQUENCES.
